overview_of_class:
For students with some previous experience in Spanish. Communicative method. Further development of speaking, listening, conversation, and grammar skills, as well as knowledge of Hispanic culture, through context.
Three class meetings a week.
Outside online video program twice a week.
Offered winter and spring.
Prerequisite: 115-1
name: Accelerated Elementary Spanish
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

One Addtl hour or more TBA

Prerequisites apply, see description
